attributes.action: Use political powers to get Robbie Rotten added as Smash Ultimate DLC.
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst we are aware that the UK government does not and has never claimed to have any part in the selection process or influence on the decisions made by Masahiro Sakurai or the Super Smash Brothers team, it is impossible to deny that pressure from the UK government would not possibly have an effect on its standing. 

I also believe Robbie Rotten is a good candidate that Great Britian should get behind as a whole, because he undeniably is an extremely good example of British values.

Thank you.
attributes.background: I am the man who runs the Super Smash Bro's ultimate DLC prediction page. The will of my followers has been made very clear, and we wish for the character of Robbie Rotten from the 2004-2014 Nickelodeon show 'LazyTown' to be added as free Super Smash Brothers Ultimate DLC.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this is something the UK Government or Parliament isn't responsible for.
